methods.javadoc: Returns the Address of the first layout in this map
methods.name: getStartAddress
methods.comment: Returns the Address of the first layout in this map

methods.javadoc: Returns the index of the last layout in this map.
methods.name: getEndAddress
methods.comment: Returns the index of the last layout in this map.

methods.javadoc: Returns the number of layouts in this map.
methods.name: getNumLayouts
methods.comment: Returns the number of layouts in this map.

methods.name: getLayoutAddress
methods.comment: Returns the address of the i'th layout in this map.

params.name: i
params.comment: the index into the local array of layouts

return.comment: the address of the i'th layout in this map.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the y position of the top of the i'th layout.
@param i the index of the layout.
methods.name: getBeginPosition
methods.comment: Returns the y position of the top of the i'th layout.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the y position of the bottom of the i'th layout.
@param i the index of the layout.
methods.name: getEndPosition
methods.comment: Returns the y position of the bottom of the i'th layout.

methods.name: getMarkPosition
methods.comment: Returns pixel location to draw marker icon.

params.name: i
params.comment: the index of the layout to be marked with an icon.

return.comment: the vertical pixel location at which to draw the icon.

methods.name: hasPrimaryField
methods.comment: Determines if the given layout index contains the primary field

return.comment: true if the layout contains the primary field.

methods.javadoc:
Finds the layout containing the given point.
@param y the y coordinate of layout to be found.
methods.name: findLayoutAt
methods.comment: Finds the layout containing the given point.

params.name: y
params.comment: the y coordinate of layout to be found.

methods.name: getLayoutEndAddress
methods.comment:
Returns the address of the bottom of the i'th layout.  
 
 Note: this will return null if at the end of an overlay block.

return.comment: the address of the bottom of the i'th layout

methods.javadoc:
Gets the address set of this address map.
@return the address set of this address map
methods.name: getAddressSet
methods.comment: Gets the address set of this address map.

return.comment: the address set of this address map
